summary: Increases the density of grass in the forests, tundras, and all over Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
---DESCRIPTION---

Increases the density of grass in Skyrim! Making for some more scenic and beautiful scenes!

                                                       ---INSTALL---

Drop the file into the data folder and activate it in the launcher! yes, it is really that simple! To uninstall simply un-check the file in the launcher and delete MoreGrass.esp from the data folder.


                                                    ---OTHER NOTES---

This will most likely be a relatively large toll on your system. Running a 9800 GT with a few other graphics mods reduced my FPS, newer systems should not take much of a FPS hit.

The file is also hosted in the Steam Workshop by me! 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8256

If you like it feel free to endorse, upload your own images, and comment!
author: MadMonkey119
